title: Riot employee behavior

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Is this kind of public behavior ok by a riot employee? Discuss.

Personally, I think this makes the company look bad. If rioters have extreme opinions like this they should keep it to themselves or at least in their own social circle. Why post it for the world to see....

edit: if anyone is curious who the rioter is there are sources online (like reddit) that shows his identity. but i wont say it here
